title: GLUTEN FREE CHICKEN CHOW MEIN
directions: Combine Chicken Marinade ingredients above. For best flavor, combine ~30 mins prior to cooking.
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add the peanut oil.
Add Chicken and a bit of marinade to skillet and cook for 7-10 minutes until marinade begins to thicken. Set chicken aside.
Bring a salted pot of water to a boil. Add Manini’s Linguini and cook for 3 minutes.
In a new skillet over medium-high heat, add peanut oil.
Add the Carrots, 1/2 Onion, and 1/2 head of Cabbage. Cook for 1 minute.
Add 1/4 cup Chicken, 1/4 cup GF Soy Sauce and 1 tsp Sesame Oil
Toss in Linguini and Chicken Thighs and top dish with sliced Green Onions.
ingredients: 1 Tbsp Peanut Oil (or any other nut oil)
1 package of Boneless Chicken Thighs (much more tender than Chicken Breasts)
